description:
This pool is intended to be used with the official PhiHash miner (phihashminer) as a custom miner in HiveOS.

Download URL:
https://github.com/PhicoinProject/phihashminer_v2/releases/latest/download/phihashminer.tar.gz

Example configuration (Custom miner):
URL: stratum+tcp://phipool.kuradisia.io:11111
WALLET: <your PHI address>
WORKER: <rig name>
PASSWORD: x
Extra args: -G
